ygData.subject: Re: Count down
ygData.msgSnippet: Power flashed as the computer lost control of the base. I have commands comeing in from outside the base. it exclaimed. Well block them. Ignatius called

Power flashed as the computer lost control of the base. "I have commands
comeing in from outside the base." it exclaimed.

"Well block them." Ignatius called back knowing he wouldn't last long if the
Stasis field fell.

"I can't" the computer commented, "They're coming in on a priority
frequency." The computer was confused since there was only one bot with the
priority codes that could override his systems. "I suggest you run like the
abyss was opening beneath you because all hells about to break loose." The
ravings of the computer were overshadowed as Ignatius turned and opened fire
on the hostages spreading the full fury from his Talons at each and every
one of them. "Zoe, wherever you are get the Pit out of here."

As the lone Trainer opened fire the power was cut to the bridge returning
the functions to the captives.

Throughout the halls the defenses lose power and hang uselessly from the
walls and ceilings where they were once contained.

Outside the base the Autoguns returned to the sand which once hid them.
